name: Flying Airplane Mission 2018
description:
Guide and steer your flying airplane through the waypoints!!
Enjoy cockpit view and detailed enteriors of Airplane!!



Game Play Controls:

- Tilt
- Buttons
- Joystick




Game Tips:

- Get more reward to unlock more city pilot plane.
- While airplane landing, avoid airplane crashing.
- Pass throughout all circles to get extra bonus



Key Features:

- HD graphics & virtual sound
- Challenging missions
- Plenty of airplane simulator selections
- Plenty of aeroplane flying simulator animations
- Realistic physics for city pilot plane
